title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 730.4 - Changes in tariffs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 730.4 - Changes in tariffs

State Regulations
(a) Notice. Fares and regulations which have been filed must be allowed to become effective
and remain in effect for at least 30 days before being changed, canceled, or
withdrawn. Any change must be received for filing at least 30 days before its
proposed effective date, unless otherwise authorized by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
730.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
